mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ShopUser(user_email, user_pw, user_name, user_gender, user_birth, user_phone, is_owner, sign_date, point) VALUES(#{user_email}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_gender}, #{user_birth}, #{user_phone}, #{is_owner}, #{sign_date}, #{point})
mapper.update: UPDATE ShopUser set user_pw=#{user_pw}, user_phone=#{user_phone} WHERE user_email=#{user_email}
